title: Memes and You! What content belongs on GD and what belongs on M&G? A flowchart.
body:
Since it appears there's some major confusion on what belongs where along the spectrum of memes, let me show you this handy little flow chart I made!

https://puu.sh/AVPYt/bb4e43c028.png

As you can see by this image provided, GD is a place for _all_ memes, whereas M&G is a place for League memes only!
